title: AED Game Character Voice -  The Giant
description: Brace yourself for the colossal presence of The Giant – a ravenous and tyrannical force that towers above all, casting a shadow of impending doom over all the land!
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Album Art by Dalton Webb


AED Game Character Voice - The Giant voice-over sound library provides you with more than 300+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, characters, and outstanding game-play audio experiences. 


The Giants voice profile is deep, gritty and filled with malice that is sure to have your audience trembling in fear. He is perfect for Villainous and larger than life in-game non-player characters or any antagonist game characters.. His voice is ready for your game as is, provided in a clean audio format in case you want to further process with vocal effects.


Features:


-Vocal Profile: Male, Menacing, Slight British/Cockney accent, Deep, Gruff.

- Perfect for NPC's in game and/or film based trailers.

-Featuring custom lines and NPC stock lines like: Kill them, I will destroy you, Attack. Perfect for MMO's, RPG's MOBA and RTS games.

-Featuring a variety of laughing, fighting, jumping and pain vocalizations to fully flesh out your next hero or villain in game!

-Works with any DAW or Game Engine

- Royalty Free and YouTube friendly

- Ready to rock, straight out of the box!
technicalDetails:
Features:

Male voice-over audio files

116 MB of voice samples

All in 44.1k/16 bit .wav file format


Number of Audio Waves: 327


Number of Audio Cues: 327


Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit


Do Sound FX loop: No


Windows: Yes


Mac: Yes
